attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What is PAES? Pretty Average European Skramz. Why must it be banned? It is dragging down the quality of global screamo. The legacy of bands such as Orchid and Neil Perry is being destroyed by pale imitators from the mainland of Europe. THEY MUST BE STOPPED.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
